author: Moobeat (noreply@blogger.com)
title: Patch 7.6 Server Maintenance
text:
[ RECENT NEWS :  Meddler's Quick Gameplay Thoughts for March 20th  / Lee Sin Skin Teaser ]


Good news everyone! Server maintenance for our next patch,  Patch  7.6 , has been scheduled!

On  March 22nd  at 3:00 am PT for  NA ,   4:00 UK time for  EUW , and 2:00 CET for  EUNE , servers will go down for maintenance and the  7.6  patch will be applied!

Here's   NA  announcement from the server status page:
"On 03/22/17, starting at, 01:30 Pacific Time (08:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 7.6. At 03:00 Pacific time (10:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours." Be sure to check your particular servers status page for your region's specific  7.6   maintenance times:

[ NA ,  EUW ,  EUNE ,  BR ,  TR ,  LAS ,  LAN ,  RU ,  OCE ] 
Until the official patch notes are available, check the    [7.6 PBE content]   for a tentative look at what is coming in the patch - including the Galio champion update, new skins, and more!
